_meta.copy: Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="external"%}) for more information about ACMI.

headline.copy: Why Apple is the best{%br%}place to buy iPad.

bodyCopy.copy: When you choose to check out at Apple with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments.{%sosumi type="external" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}), the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app, or by calling :[ :[1800MYAPPLE]({%url metadata="2" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}), and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See :[here]({%url metadata="3" destination-type="appleExternal"%}) for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. As of {%apr value="effectiveDate"%}, the variable APR on new Apple{%nbsp%}Card accounts ranges from {%apr value="rates"%}. You must elect to use ACMI at checkout. If you buy an ACMIeligible product with a one-time payment on Apple{%nbsp%}Card at checkout, that purchase is subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. In order to buy an iPhone with ACMI, you must select one of the following carriers (prepaid carrier plans are not supported): AT&T, Boost Mobile, TMobile, or Verizon. An iPhone purchased with ACMI is always unlocked, so you can switch carriers at any time, subject to your carriers terms. ACMI is not available for purchases made at the following special storefronts or when using these discounts in-store at Apple: Apple Employee Purchase Plan; participating corporate Employee Purchase Programs; Apple at Work for small businesses; Government and Veterans and Military Purchase Programs; or on refurbished devices. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata="4" destination-type="external"%}) for more information about ACMI.{%br%}{%br%}To access and use all Apple{%nbsp%}Card features and products available only to Apple{%nbsp%}Card users, you must add Apple{%nbsp%}Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple{%nbsp%}Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.{%br%}{%br%}Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC, a subsidiary of Apple{%nbsp%}Inc., is a service provider of Goldman Sachs Bank USA for Apple{%nbsp%}Card and Savings accounts. Neither Apple{%nbsp%}Inc. nor Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC is a{%nbsp%}bank.{%br%}{%br%}All communications from Apple and Goldman Sachs Bank USA about Apple{%nbsp%}Card (including transactional and marketing communications) and customer service support are available in English. Certain communications about Apple{%nbsp%}Card can be viewed in another language depending on your device language settings. If you reside in the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, or U.S. Minor Outlying Islands, please call Goldman Sachs at :[ :[877-255-5923]({%url metadata="5" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}) with questions about Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%br%}{%br%}

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about Apple Card Monthly Installments

inlineHeader.copy: Pay for your new iPad over time, interest{%nbhyp%}free with Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%sosumi type="external" metadata="1"%} Simply choose to check out at Apple with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments as your payment option when you make your purchase. And enjoy 3% Daily Cash back, all up front. Terms{%nbsp%}apply.

_meta.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}), the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app, or by calling :[ :[1800MYAPPLE]({%url metadata="2" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}), and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See :[here]({%url metadata="3" destination-type="appleExternal"%}) for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. Apple{%nbsp%}Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.{%br%}{%br%}Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC, a subsidiary of Apple{%nbsp%}Inc., is a service provider of Goldman Sachs Bank USA for Apple{%nbsp%}Card and Savings accounts. Neither Apple{%nbsp%}Inc. nor Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC is a{%nbsp%}bank.{%br%}{%br%}All communications from Apple and Goldman Sachs Bank USA about Apple{%nbsp%}Card (including transactional and marketing communications) and customer service support are available in English. Certain communications about Apple{%nbsp%}Card can be viewed in another language depending on your device language settings. If you reside in the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, or U.S. Minor Outlying Islands, please call Goldman Sachs at :[ :[877-255-5923]({%url metadata="5" destination-type="external"%})]({%wj%}) with questions about Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%br%}{%br%}

headline.copy: Save :[up to {%pricing id="slug:family_ipad_pro" template="credit.display.smart" type="tradein"%}]({%pricing-fallback id="slug:family_ipad_pro" type="tradein" collapse="true"%}) with Apple Trade{%nbsp%}In.

bodyCopy.copy: Get credit towards your next iPad when you trade in an eligible device.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about Apple Trade in

headline.copy: Trade in your eligible device for credit.

inlineHeader.copy: Just add a trade{%nbhyp%}in when you choose a new product. Once your eligible device has been received and verified, well credit the value to your payment method. Or choose to check out with Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments and well apply the credit instantly. Terms apply.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about Apple Trade in

bodyCopy.copy: Available to college students and educators.

headline.copy: Shop our Education Store and save.

inlineHeader.copy: You can save on a new iPad, Mac, and more with Apple education pricing. Its available to current and newly accepted college students and their parents, as well as faculty, staff, and homeschool teachers of all grade levels.{%sosumi type="promoted" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Education pricing is available to current and newly accepted college students and their parents, as well as faculty, staff, and homeschool teachers of all grade levels. For more information, visit :[apple.com/us-edu/store]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}).

headline.copy: Meet your new iPad with Personal Setup.

bodyCopy.copy: Jump into online sessions with a Specialist to set up your iPad and discover new features.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about your new iPad

inlineHeader.copy: When you buy your new iPad directly from Apple, youll get access to Personal Setup. In these online sessions, a Specialist can guide you through setup and data transfer or focus on features that help you make the most of your iPad. Best of all, you can join whenever works for you, from wherever you are.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about your new iPad

analyticsAttributes.name: data-analytics-title
analyticsAttributes.value: learn more about online personal setup

headline.copy: Get flexible delivery and easy pickup.

bodyCopy.copy: Choose two{%nbhyp%}hour delivery from an Apple{%nbsp%}Store, free delivery or easy pickup options.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about delivery and pickup options.

inlineHeader.copy: Get your new Apple products quickly and easily with 2{%nbhyp%}hour delivery from an Apple{%nbsp%}Store, free nextday delivery, or convenient Apple pickup options.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about delivery and pickup options.

bodyCopy.copy: Engrave your new iPad with a mix of emoji, names, initials and{%nbsp%}numbers.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about engraving your iPad

inlineHeader.copy: Choose from new engraving options. Its the perfect way to personalize your iPad. Add a special message, name, or birthday. Even combine text and numbers with your favorite emoji.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: You can return your iPad even if you engrave it. And when youre ready to upgrade, it wont change your trade{%nbhyp%}in value.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about engraving your iPad

bodyCopy.copy: Let us guide you live over video and answer all of your questions.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about shopping with a Specialist over video

analyticsAttributes.name: data-analytics-title
analyticsAttributes.value: open modal - shop with a specialist

inlineHeader.copy: We can help you choose the product you need while guiding you through the online Apple{%nbsp%}Store. You wont appear on camera. Available 7 a.m.{%nbhyp%}7 p.m. PT

headline.copy: Explore a shopping experience designed around{%nbsp%}you.

bodyCopy.copy: Use the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app to get a more personal way to shop.

accessibilityText.copy: Learn more about shopping using Apple Store app

headline.copy: Shop in the{%brs%} Apple{%nbsp%}Store app,{%brs%} :[tailored specifically]({%wj%}){%brs%} for{%nbsp%}you.

inlineHeader.copy: Get personalized product recommendations, compare models, access your Saved Items, and track your orders. Plus, opt in today to get updates on new products, promotions, flexible payment options, and store events.

accessibilityText.copy: Next item in Why Apple gallery
Previous item in Why Apple gallery

alt.copy: iPad Pro, landscape orientation, space black color, with Apple Pencil resting atop iPad Pro, display with multiple app windows tiled on top of each other, including Final Cut Pro with multiple video editing features and timeline, Maps, Notes, and various media clips

copy.copy: Made for the large Multi{%nbhyp%}Touch display, iPadOS delivers game-changing capabilities that make iPad incredibly powerful and easy to use. The Liquid{%nbsp%}Glass design brings a stunning look and more vitality to everything you see  and touch.

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, displayed with photo editing app featuring detailed robot blueprints and handwritten annotations, multiple design stages, tiled over Photos Library, Downloads folder preview fanned out overlaid on display

copy.copy: An intuitive, flexible windowing system makes it easy to manage all your apps and switch between them exactly the way you like. Open more windows at once, and resize and arrange them to suit your workflow.

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, silver color, attached to Magic Keyboard in landscape orientation, white color, all connected to external Studio Display. iPad Pro display with graphic design app, vibrant colors, and text, Studio Display showing various apps and a 3D model

heading.copy: Over a million other ways to use it.

copy.copy: Turn your iPad into almost anything  from a math classroom or workstation to a professional recording studio  with apps from the App{%nbsp%}Store. With over a million apps made just for iPad, theres something for everyone.

alt.copy: 5 iPad Pro devices, Apple Pencil Pro, front exterior, showcasing different apps and features including Adobe Illustrator, Procreate, Final Cut Pro, and GarageBand, displays showing photo editing app editing an article, video editing app with a picture of a model in a blue coat and black and white printed pants, color adjustment panel open on with various video effects and sliders and timeline, a rendering of a bionic hand with photo editing tools open, abstract photo of a model being edited, a song being edited in Garage Band

modalPageDescription.copy: iPadOS is the operating system that lets you touch, type, and draw on one magical device. With tons of apps for iPad, theres something for everyone.

alt.copy: An underwater scene created in Image Playground, a new Apple Intelligence feature with Notes in the background

copy.copy: The latest iPad{%nbsp%}Pro, iPad{%nbsp%}Air, and iPad{%nbsp%}mini models are built for Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence, which helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data  not even{%nbsp%}Apple.

_meta.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is available in beta. Some features may not be available in all regions or languages. For feature and language availability and system requirements, see :[support.apple.com/121115]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="appleExternal"%}).

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, display showing home screen with flexible windowing, various app icons in custom arrangement, including FaceTime, Files, Reminders, Maps, Home, Camera, App Store, Books, Podcasts, TV, News, and Shortcuts, widgets including weather forecast for San Francisco, a recent photo of someone swimming, and a 2-day calendar snapshot, Dock with icons for Notes, Music, Calendar, and more

copy.copy: Turn on Live{%nbsp%}Translation to automatically translate texts in Messages,{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} display live translated captions in FaceTime, and get spoken translations for calls in the Phone{%nbsp%}app.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="2"%}

_meta.copy: Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Messages is available in Chinese (Simplified), English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Series{%nbsp%}9 and later, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Ultra{%nbsp%}2 and later and Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}SE{%nbsp%}3 when paired with an Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence-enabled iPhone.

Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Phone and FaceTime is available for one-on-one calls in English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac.

alt.copy: Text conversation between two individuals making plans for dinner, with Spanish text above English text in each bubble, showing Apple Intelligence Live Translation feature

copy.copy: Turn a rough sketch into a related image that complements your notes with Image{%nbsp%}Wand, make a Genmoji right in the keyboard to match any conversation, and{%nbsp%}more.

alt.copy: iPad Pro, landscape orientation, space black color, display with dark blue and green gradient background with Keynote app open showing infographic about fortifying daily facial oil with ingredients like sea buckthorn, rosehip seed oil, Kakadu plum, and acerola cherry extract, inset: hand-drawn sketch, circled, surrounded by custom-generated graphics by Apple Intelligence

heading.copy: The start of a new era for Siri.

copy.copy: With an all{%nbhyp%}new design, richer language understanding, and expansive product knowledge about your devices, Siri is more helpful than{%nbsp%}ever.

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black color, rounded corners, display showing an experimental depiction of a traditional Korean rice cake with an explanation of the photo's characteristics generated by Apple Intelligence with ChatGPT integration

heading.copy: Designed to protect your privacy at every step.

copy.copy: With Private Cloud Compute, Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence can draw on larger Apple-designed server-based models, running on Apple{%nbsp%}silicon, to handle more complex requests while protecting your{%nbsp%}privacy.

alt.copy: Privacy Apple logo

modalPageDescription.copy: iPad is built for Apple Intelligence. It helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly with groundbreaking privacy protections.

headline.copy: Your workplace can{%nbsp%}be{%nbsp%}any{%nbsp%}place. Checking the change

alt.copy: A person using an iPad and Apple Pencil outdoors

copy.copy: Theres never been a more joyful way of getting stuff done than with iPad. Designed for Multi-Touch, simple gestures help you get around smoothly and quickly. Add an Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil to write and draw your ideas or attach a keyboard to rip through your inbox.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} And do it all with the game-changing performance of Apple{%nbsp%}silicon.

alt.copy: Left: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black color, display with multiple app screens including Notes, Calendar, and Music, with the dock at the bottom showing app icons, right: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black color, display showing recipes and calendar

copy.copy: Connect with family, friends, and your team wherever you go. Speedy Wi{%nbhyp%}Fi lets you download, upload, and transfer whatever documents, folders, and files you need from just about anywhere. And with 5G, you can stay connected even when youre away from{%nbsp%}Wi{%nbhyp%}Fi.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier. For details on 5G support, contact your carrier and see :[apple.com/ipad/cellular]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}).

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black color, rounded corners, black display bezel, attached to Magic Keyboard, space black, display showing FaceTime video call being live translated with simultaneous chat, to the right an educational app showing a presentation of "Comparative Mythology" with text, diagrams, and hand-written notes

heading.copy: Store whats important. Get to it with ease.

copy.copy: Organize, share, and get to all your stuff with the Files app. And easily access and manage whats on your iPad, in iCloud, or on cloud services like{%nbsp%}Box.

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black color, rounded corners, black display bezel, display showing a new message with an invitation to a live listening party for Danger Longoria's debut album, Files app open with multiple files fanned vertically

modalPageDescription.copy: Work from anywhere with iPad. Connect with friends, family, and your team wherever you are. Add Apple Pencil or attach a keyboard and do even more.

alt.copy: Close up of an illustration created in Procreate

headline.copy: Take your inner artist out and{%nbsp%}about.

copy.copy: With a fully immersive touchscreen, iPad is a canvas thats ready for you to express your most creative self. From 3D sculpting and composing a beat to painting a masterpiece in Adobe{%nbsp%}Fresco, iPad is where your most creative ideas come to{%nbsp%}life.

alt.copy: Two iPad devices and an iPad Air featuring FlipaClip, Adobe Fresco, and GarageBand apps

heading.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil is the ultimate creative tool.

copy.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil lets you easily sketch a new idea in Notes, finish a watercolor in Procreate, or draw up production-ready architectural plans in{%nbsp%}SketchUp.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

alt.copy: An iPad Air showcasing a Procreate drawing that's spreading out into the background

heading.copy: Take your best shot. And video.

copy.copy: iPad has powerful front and back cameras that allow you to create feature films, high-quality photos, and other amazing content. Apps like Final{%nbsp%}Cut{%nbsp%}Pro and Adobe{%nbsp%}Lightroom let you shoot, edit, and share  all from one portable{%nbsp%}device.

alt.copy: Two iPad Pro devices showcasing Final Cut Pro 2.0 and Photos apps

modalPageDescription.copy: iPad brings creative ideas to life. Paint a masterpiece, compose music, or draw up architectural plans. Shoot feature films and high-quality photos.

alt.copy: A person sitting on the floor of a classroom using an iPad

copy.copy: With fast Wi{%nbhyp%}Fi and cellular capabilities, built{%nbhyp%}in cameras help you create powerful connections wherever you are. Join class, attend a lecture on Zoom, tackle a group project on FaceTime, or simply stay in touch with colleagues and classmates from all over.

alt.copy: A pair of hands holding an iPad Pro showcasing a Group FaceTime call

copy.copy: Jump{%nbhyp%}start your notes and projects with accessories that were made for iPad.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} Grab an Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil and take handwritten and digital notes or connect a keyboard and make quick work of all your emails, essays, and{%nbsp%}presentations.

alt.copy: Side view of iPad Air showcasing the Keynote app, attached to the Magic Keyboard for iPad Air with an Apple Pencil sitting nearby

copy.copy: iPad is perfect for learning something new. From step-by-step instructions with Kitchen Stories to zipping through a self-guided course, theres an app for whatever  and however  you want to learn, including immersive augmented reality apps.

alt.copy: An iPad and iPad Air showcasing the JigSpace and Kitchen Stories apps

modalPageDescription.copy: Learn from anywhere with iPad. Attend a lecture, take incredible notes, tackle a group project or learn something new with tons of apps for iPad.

alt.copy: Gaming screen showing dynamic graphics

heading.copy: Always have your favorite content with you.

copy.copy: iPad is a 24/7 all-access pass to your favorite movies, TV shows, books, and music wherever you are.

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black, black display bezel, rounded corners, display showing Apple Music interface, showing song "All Of Me" by Nao, with lyrics "How did someone like you find somebody like me" visible on the screen

heading.copy: A home theater in your hands.

copy.copy: With an immersive display, amazing speakers, and advanced display technologies like ProMotion, all your content looks and sounds amazing.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: The displays have rounded corners. When measured diagonally as a rectangle, the 13{%nbhyp%}inch iPad{%nbsp%}Pro is 13{%nbsp%}inches, the 11{%nbhyp%}inch iPad{%nbsp%}Pro is 11.1{%nbsp%}inches, the 13{%nbhyp%}inch iPad{%nbsp%}Air is 12.9{%nbsp%}inches, the 11{%nbhyp%}inch iPad{%nbsp%}Air and iPad are 10.86{%nbsp%}inches, and the iPad{%nbsp%}mini is 8.3{%nbsp%}inches. Actual viewable area is less.

alt.copy: iPad Pro attached to Magic Keyboard, front exterior, open, display with TV app playing the Apple TV+ original film Highest 2 Lowest with ASAP Rocky as Yung Felon rapping into a microphone

copy.copy: The power of Apple{%nbsp%}silicon combined with a stunning display makes iPad the ultimate immersive gaming experience. Level up by attaching a keyboard or mouse. You can even connect a wireless controller to create a portable console experience everywhere you go.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

alt.copy: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, rounded corners, black display bezel, display showcasing Arknights: Endfield video game

modalPageDescription.copy: iPad is a 24/7 all-access pass to your favorite movies, TV shows, books, and music wherever you are. Play games on the ultimate immersive display.

alt.copy: An Apple Pencil with colorful lettering in Notes

heading.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil sets the standard for drawing, writing, and note{%nbhyp%}taking.

copy.copy: Keep a journal, quickly jot down a grocery list, and take amazing class notes. Want to convert those notes to text? No problem. iPad is ready to capture every{%nbsp%}thought.

alt.copy: An Apple Pencil Pro drawing on an iPad Pro showcasing the Notes app

copy.copy: Whether its designing something beautiful in Procreate, brushing up your photos in Affinity{%nbsp%}Photo{%nbsp%}2, or finishing your home project in Shapr3D, Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil has the ability to bring your creative ideas to life with incredible precision.

alt.copy: A collection of five different iPad devices showcasing different apps including Affinity Photo 2, Procreate, Affinity Designer 2, and Procreate Dreams

heading.copy: Special features to help your workflow.

copy.copy: With iPadOS, Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil feels more like writing on paper. Easily sign documents, mark up screenshots, write in text fields, and even leave a note over an app or screen with Quick{%nbsp%}Notes.

alt.copy: An Apple Pencil Pro marking up a Safari screenshot on an iPad Pro

modalPageDescription.copy: With iPad, Apple Pencil sets the standard for drawing, writing, and note-taking. Draw, sign documents, or mark up anything with incredible precision.

Next item in Get to know iPad gallery

bodyCopy.copy: Dream it up. Jot it down.

alt.copy: An Apple Pencil magnetically attached to the top of an iPad

bodyCopy.copy: Type it out. Take it with you.

alt.copy: Top view of Magic Keyboard for iPad Pro attached to an iPad Pro

accessibilityText.copy: Previous item in iPad Essentials gallery
Next item in iPad Essentials gallery

bodyCopy.copy: iPad is perfect for taking the content you capture on iPhone and bringing it to life on an immersive canvas. You can shoot videos and photos on your iPhone and use the large display of your iPad to edit, add animations, and more. You can also pick up wherever you left off with Handoff.

alt.copy: An iPhone 15 and iPad side by side highlighting how a photo taken with the camera on iPhone can be marked up in the Photos app on iPad

bodyCopy.copy: iPad and Mac are designed to work together to form the ultimate creative setup. Sketch on your iPad and have it appear instantly on your Mac with Sidecar. Then use your iPad for drawing or editing with Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil or as a second display. Extend your workflow to new places, and when you return to your desk, Universal Control allows you to use one mouse or trackpad seamlessly across both{%nbsp%}devices.

alt.copy: An iPad and MacBook Pro side by side highlighting how a photo edited on iPad can be used in a Pages document on a Mac

bodyCopy.copy: iPad is a great way to optimize your workouts while tracking your progress on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch. See personal metrics from Apple{%nbsp%}Watch integrated on the screen of your iPad in real time. The sensors in Apple{%nbsp%}Watch combine with advanced algorithms to provide data that keeps you motivated. And see it all come together on your Health app on{%nbsp%}iPad.

alt.copy: An Apple Watch and iPad side by side highlighting how an Apple Fitness+ workout on iPad is tracked on Apple Watch

items.copy: Apps are available on the App{%nbsp%}Store. Title availability is subject to change.
All Of Me written by Abby Keen, Dyo, Neo Jessica Joshua, PRGRSHN.
Arknights: Endfield coming to iPadOS. Release date subject to change. See developer website for current release information.
Features are subject to change. Some features, applications, and services may not be available in all regions or all languages.

description.copy: Explore every iPad. Featuring iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad mini, and iPad. For work, creativity, or play.

copy.copy: Get gifts in time for the holidays with free two-hour delivery on eligible products  now through{%nbsp%}12/24.{%sosumi type="promoted" metadata="1"%}

_meta.copy: $0 two-hour delivery on purchases made from December 22, 2025, through December 24, 2025, on eligible Apple products in most metros. Offer applies to in{%nbhyp%}stock purchase(s) of iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch, AirPods, Apple{%nbsp%}TV, and Beats only. Offer is not available on customized Mac, engraved products, and for certain order types including orders paid for with financing or by bank transfer. Delivery times vary according to your selected delivery address, availability of your items, and the time of day you place your order. :[Find a store]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}) to view local store hours or see checkout for estimated delivery. A signature is required for delivery.

copy.copy: Order by 12/22 for free delivery of in-stock items by 12/24. See checkout for specific delivery dates and{%nbsp%}options.
